目前正盯著WIKI列出的BUG表
現有四個BUG
三個和活塞有關

以下節錄：

New Bugs:
Pushing leaves with a piston causes the game to crash.
Pushing tall grass with a piston causes the game to crash.
Right clicking sheep while holding nothing causes the game to crash.
Placing a Redstone Torch near a piston SOMETIMES causes the game to crash.

1701已出
BUG修正......
Bug fixes:Fixed piston bug.Fixed right clicking on a sheep empty-handed causing game to crash.Worlds crashed are now loadable again.
New Bugs:Right clicking on an unsheared sheep removes the item in your hand (does not include shears).Hitting a certain side of or breaking an iron or wooden door with your hands will make pink or purple particles. This applies to punching or using a tool.Breaking obsidian with a wooden shovel will create pink/purple particles.Cobweb doesn't break and it doesn't hurt anymoreActivating a pressure plate on a block on a piston causes a crash.
